info.description: Atlas exposes a variety of REST endpoints to work with types, entities, lineage and data discovery.
info.title: Atlas REST API

tags.name: DiscoveryREST
tags.description: REST interface for data discovery using dsl or full text search.

tags.name: LineageREST
tags.description: REST interface for an entity's lineage information.

tags.name: TypesREST
tags.description: REST interface for CRUD operations on type definitions.

json_AtlasClassification.title: AtlasClassification
json_AtlasClassification.description: An instance of a classification; it doesn't have an identity, this object exists only when associated with an entity.

json_AtlasStruct.title: AtlasStruct
json_AtlasStruct.description: Captures details of struct contents. Not instantiated directly, used only via AtlasEntity, AtlasClassification.

json_SearchFilter.title: SearchFilter
json_SearchFilter.description: Generic filter, to specify search criteria using name/value pairs.

json_SortType.title: SortType
json_SortType.description: to specify whether the result should be sorted? If yes, whether asc or desc.

xml_ns0_searchFilter.title: searchFilter
xml_ns0_searchFilter.description: Generic filter, to specify search criteria using name/value pairs.

xml_ns0_sortType.title: sortType
xml_ns0_sortType.description: to specify whether the result should be sorted? If yes, whether asc or desc.

xml_ns0_atlasClassification.title: atlasClassification
xml_ns0_atlasClassification.description: An instance of a classification; it doesn't have an identity, this object exists only when associated with an entity.

xml_ns0_atlasStruct.title: atlasStruct
xml_ns0_atlasStruct.description: Captures details of struct contents. Not instantiated directly, used only via AtlasEntity, AtlasClassification.

post.summary: Create new entity or update existing entity in Atlas.
post.description:
Create new entity or update existing entity in Atlas.
Existing entity is matched using its unique guid if supplied or by its unique attributes eg: qualifiedName

delete.summary: Bulk API to delete list of entities identified by its GUIDs.
delete.description: Bulk API to delete list of entities identified by its GUIDs

200.description: AtlasEntity

put.summary: Entity Partial Update - Add/Update entity attribute identified by its GUID.
put.description:
Entity Partial Update - Add/Update entity attribute identified by its GUID.
Supports only uprimitive attribute type and entity references.
does not support updation of complex types like arrays, maps
Null updates are not possible

delete.summary: Deletes a given classification from an existing entity represented by a guid.
delete.description: Deletes a given classification from an existing entity represented by a guid.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: globally unique identifier for the entity

get.description: Gets the list of classifications for a given entity represented by a guid.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: globally unique identifier for the entity

200.description: classification for the given entity guid

parameters.name: guid

200.description: a list of classifications for the given entity guid

post.summary: Adds classifications to an existing entity represented by a guid.
post.description: Adds classifications to an existing entity represented by a guid.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: globally unique identifier for the entity

put.summary: Updates classifications to an existing entity represented by a guid.
put.description: Updates classifications to an existing entity represented by a guid.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: globally unique identifier for the entity

delete.summary: Delete an entity identified by its type and unique attributes.
delete.description:
Delete an entity identified by its type and unique attributes.

In addition to the typeName path parameter, attribute key-value pair(s) can be provided in the following format

attr:<attrName>=<attrValue>

NOTE: The attrName and attrValue should be unique across entities, eg. qualifiedName

The REST request would look something like this

DELETE /v2/entity/uniqueAttribute/type/aType?attr:aTypeAttribute=someValue

get.summary: Fetch complete definition of an entity given its type and unique attribute.
get.description:
Fetch complete definition of an entity given its type and unique attribute.

In addition to the typeName path parameter, attribute key-value pair(s) can be provided in the following format

attr:<attrName>=<attrValue>

NOTE: The attrName and attrValue should be unique across entities, eg. qualifiedName

The REST request would look something like this

GET /v2/entity/uniqueAttribute/type/aType?attr:aTypeAttribute=someValue

200.description: AtlasEntityWithExtInfo

put.summary:
Entity Partial Update - Allows a subset of attributes to be updated on
an entity which is identified by its type and unique attribute  eg: Referenceable.
put.description:
Entity Partial Update - Allows a subset of attributes to be updated on
an entity which is identified by its type and unique attribute  eg: Referenceable.qualifiedName.
Null updates are not possible

In addition to the typeName path parameter, attribute key-value pair(s) can be provided in the following format

attr:<attrName>=<attrValue>

NOTE: The attrName and attrValue should be unique across entities, eg. qualifiedName

The REST request would look something like this

PUT /v2/entity/uniqueAttribute/type/aType?attr:aTypeAttribute=someValue

delete.summary: Deletes a given classification from an entity identified by its type and unique attributes.
delete.description: Deletes a given classification from an entity identified by its type and unique attributes.

get.summary: Retrieve all glossaries registered with Atlas.
get.description: Retrieve all glossaries registered with Atlas

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size - by default there is no paging

200.description: List of existing glossaries fitting the search criteria or empty list if nothing matches

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Glossary definition, terms & categories can be anchored to a glossary
using the anchor attribute when creating the Term/Category

200.description: If glossary creation was successful

400.description: If Glossary definition has invalid or missing information

409.description: If Glossary definition already exists (duplicate qualifiedName)

200.description: If BULK glossary category creation was successful

400.description: If ANY Glossary category definition has invalid or missing information

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
glossary category definition, a category must be anchored to a Glossary when creating
Optionally, terms belonging to the category and the hierarchy can also be defined during creation

200.description: If glossary category creation was successful

400.description: If Glossary category definition has invalid or missing information

409.description: If Glossary category already exists (duplicate qualifiedName)

204.description: If glossary category delete was successful

404.description: If glossary category guid in invalid

get.summary: Get specific glossary category.
get.description: Get specific glossary category

200.description: If glossary category exists for given GUID

404.description: If glossary category GUID is invalid

200.description: If glossary category partial update was successful

404.description: If glossary category guid in invalid

400.description: If Glossary category definition has invalid or missing information

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Map containing keys as attribute names and values as corresponding attribute values

200.description: If glossary category partial update was successful

404.description: If glossary category guid in invalid

400.description: If category attributes are invalid

get.summary: Get all related categories (parent and children).
get.description: Get all related categories (parent and children)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size - by default there is no paging

200.description: List of related categories

get.summary: Get all terms associated with the specific category.
get.description: Get all terms associated with the specific category

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size - by default there is no paging

200.description: List of terms for the given category or an empty list

404.description: If glossary category guid in invalid

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Glossary term definition, a term must be anchored to a Glossary at the time of creation
optionally it can be categorized as well

200.description: If glossary term creation was successful

400.description: If Glossary term definition has invalid or missing information

409.description: If Glossary term already exists (duplicate qualifiedName)

204.description: If glossary term delete was successful

404.description: If glossary term guid in invalid

get.summary: Get specific glossary term.
get.description: Get specific glossary term

200.description: If glossary term exists for given GUID

404.description: If glossary term GUID is invalid

200.description: If glossary term update was successful

404.description: If glossary term guid in invalid

400.description: If Glossary temr definition has invalid or missing information

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Map containing keys as attribute names and values as corresponding attribute values

200.description: If glossary partial update was successful

404.description: If glossary term guid in invalid

400.description: If partial attributes are invalid

200.description: If Bulk glossary terms creation was successful

400.description: If any glossary term definition has invalid or missing information

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of related entity IDs from which the term has to be dissociated

404.description: If glossary term guid in invalid

get.description: Get all entity headers assigned with the specified term

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: page size - by default there is no paging

200.description: List of entity headers (if any) for the given glossary or an empty list

404.description: If glossary term guid in invalid

post.summary: Assign the given term to the provided list of entity headers.
post.description: Assign the given term to the provided list of entity headers

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Related Entity IDs to which the term has to be associated

204.description: If the term assignment was successful

400.description: If ANY of the entity header is invalid

404.description: If glossary guid in invalid

get.summary: Retrieve data for the specified attribute search query.
get.description: Retrieve data for the specified attribute search query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the result set to only include the specified number of entries

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: start offset of the result set (useful for pagination)

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: limit the result to only entities of specified type or its sub-types

200.description:
On successful FullText lookup with some results, might return an empty list if execution succeeded
without any results

400.description: Invalid wildcard or query parameters

get.summary: Retrieve data for the specified fulltext query.
get.description: Retrieve data for the specified fulltext query

parameters.name: classification
parameters.description: limit the result to only entities tagged with the given classification or or its sub-types

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the result set to only include the specified number of entries

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: start offset of the result set (useful for pagination)

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: limit the result to only entities of specified type or its sub-types

200.description:
On successful FullText lookup with some results, might return an empty list if execution succeeded
without any results

400.description: Invalid fulltext or query parameters

post.summary: Attribute based search for entities satisfying the search parameters.
post.description: Attribute based search for entities satisfying the search parameters

200.description: On successful search

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: limit the result to only entities of specified type or its sub-types

200.description:
On successful DSL execution with some results, might return an empty list if execution succeeded

get.summary: Relationship search to search for related entities satisfying the search parameters.
get.description: Relationship search to search for related entities satisfying the search parameters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the result set to only include the specified number of entries

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: start offset of the result set (useful for pagination)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: sort the result using this attribute name, default value is 'name'

200.description: On successful search

400.description: guid is not a valid entity type or attributeName is not a valid relationship attribute

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User for whom the search is retrieved

200.description: list of all saved searches for given user

delete.summary: Bulk delete API for all types.
delete.description: Bulk delete API for all types

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A composite object that captures all types to be deleted

204.description: On successful deletion of the requested type definitions

400.description: On validation failure for any type definitions

get.summary: Bulk retrieval API for retrieving all type definitions in Atlas.
get.description: Bulk retrieval API for retrieving all type definitions in Atlas

200.description: AtlasTypesDef with type definitions matching the search criteria or else returns empty list of type definitions

post.summary: Bulk create APIs for all atlas type definitions, only new definitions will be created.
post.description:
Bulk create APIs for all atlas type definitions, only new definitions will be created.
Any changes to the existing definitions will be discarded

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A composite wrapper object with corresponding lists of the type definition

200.description: On successful update of requested type definitions

400.description: On validation failure for any type definitions

put.summary: Bulk update API for all types, changes detected in the type definitions would be persisted.
put.description: Bulk update API for all types, changes detected in the type definitions would be persisted

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A composite object that captures all type definition changes

200.description: On successful update of requested type definitions

400.description: On validation failure for any type definitions

get.summary: Bulk retrieval API for all type definitions returned as a list of minimal information header.
get.description: Bulk retrieval API for all type definitions returned as a list of minimal information header

200.description:
Returns a list of AtlasTypeDefHeader matching the search criteria
or an empty list if no match.
